snippet.title: HEXAROMA: Village Builder - Demo Announcement Game Trailer (Steam)
snippet.description:
HEXAROMA is a strategy based charming little island village builder. Dive into a relaxing yet challenging experience where you strategize the best hexagon island placements in this cute little city builder game. Place the building pieces strategically, grow your village and your tiny island.

Play the free demo and wishlist on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/3056580/HEXAROMA_Village_Builder/
